Sifiso Mabuza

About me


Experienced and motivated student pursuing a Certificate in Software Development at WeThinkCode, specializing in Python and Java. Adept in programming fundamentals and possessing excellent teamwork skills.
Additionally, as a former student at Odin Project, I gained hands-on experience in full-stack JavaScript development.
Through this comprehensive curriculum, I honed my skills in JavaScript, HTML, CSS, ReactJS, NodeJS, ExpressJS, RESTful API development, and Test-Driven Development (TDD).
These technologies have equipped me to create dynamic and responsive web applications that deliver exceptional user experiences.
